name: FTL-System
description:
FTL-System

A game made for Lost Relic Games game jam with the theme "Connection"

Control two little connected drones to replace batteries in signal-boosters and protect the main ship from asteroids!

After hundreds of breakthroughs in space colonisation, understanding of physics and engineering, the colony on The Moon has everything it needs to flourish.

The only problem is the connection to everyone else on Earth. The colonists are no longer content with the 3s delay all communications have with earth.

The FTL-Connection-System is in place, but it's power hungry and the cable can only carry data, not power.

It's up to you as a drone controller to replace the batteries in the signal-boosters along the cable and protect the GRN-V3S3L from space debris using RD-ANK0R and BL-B0L.
